title: Moncton doctors say Horizon Health has enough staff, supplies to deal with pandemic
description: Horizon Health doctors say the province started preparing a response to a pandemic after the SARS outbreak in Toronto in 2001.
content: Lead doctors at Horizon Health Network say the organization has enough supplies and staff to deal with the coronavirus pandemic Dr Ken Gillespie chief of staff at the Moncton Hospital told reporters on Friday that after the SARS outbreak in every chars
